long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pick custom colors on Wordle! (https://www.powerlanguage.co.uk/wordle/)

Adds color pickers to the settings menu to modify the color of correct letter blocks and present-in-a-different-spot letter blocks. Also changes colors copied to the clipboard when the "Share" button is clicked!

GitHub: https://github.com/kenbellows/wordle-custom-theme-extension

**If you like it, consider buying me a coffee!: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kenbellows**
